-brewster

At 10:11 AM 2/21/2003 -0800, Raymie Stata wrote:
>>> Maybe I am missing something. What is the point of writing
>>> something that wont help us do something big?
>
>I think you are missing something, we WILL be writing something that supports really big crawling.
>
>Gordon correctly points out that the plan is to get there in increments, but I imagine the increments to be measured in weeks, not quarters.
>
>Bottom line: we'll be doing large scale crawling soon enough, but even then we'll have plenty to do in front of us.
